institution’s requirements.

library users

BS INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY AREA VII: LIBRARY
PARAMETER D:
SERVICE AND UTILIZATION
IMPLEMENTATION
I.2. The library opens at least 54
hours per week for the
College/Academic Unit or 60
hours per week for the
Institution.
Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus

BS INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY AREA VII: LIBRARY
PARAMETER D:
SERVICE AND UTILIZATION
IMPLEMENTATION
I.3. The library promotes and
disseminates its program
through a regular announcement
of its new acquisitions of print
materials (books, journals,
magazines), resources, facilities,
and services.
Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus

BS INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY AREA VII: LIBRARY
PARAMETER D:
SERVICE AND UTILIZATION
IMPLEMENTATION
I.4. Librarians and staff are available
during library hours to assist and
provide library services.
Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus
